attributes.action: abolish the 31MPH speed limit on mopeds introdused in  early 1973
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Riding on the public highway is very dangerous for 2 wheeled
vehicles anyway, having to stick to a 31MPH speed limit makes
it even more dangerous, when you travel on a 40MPH limit it can be terrifying, 

with this scaryness comes the surprise of another speed breaking car to push you around.
when the 50cc engine is restricted the Ryder is giving it a lot of throttle and the engine is reving 8-12RPM and only going 31MPH because thats how fast they can legally go, if you were
allowed to unrestricted it the engine would be going 8-12RPM and doing 40-60.
